title: Elbow Grease Eg27 Scrub Mate Non Scratch Sponge, 7 cm Wide X 11.5 cm High X 3.5 cm Length
features: ELBOW GREASE SCRUB MATE: Keep your kitchen, bathroom and other areas stain, grease and grime-free with this Scrub Mate Sponge, the miracle product from Elbow Grease with thousands of positive reviews and happy customers worldwide

SOFT & HARD SPONGE: The Elbow Grease Scrub Mate sponge features soft/hard features depending on the water temperature. This magic sponge softens when used in warm water and stiffens in cold water. The product comes back to its hard form when completely dry

VERSATILE: Use this magic sponge to clean pots, pans, ovens, worktops, appliances, tiles, kitchen and bathroom sinks, showers, toilets and much more. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, the Elbow Grease Scrub Mate will get your garden furniture clean and fresh for the summer season. Ideal for use with the Elbow Grease All Purpose Degreaser spray

NON-SCRATCH FLEXIBLE DESIGN: The Scrub Mate can be hand-washed, and reused whenever you need it. Thanks to its non-scratch properties it keeps surfaces 100 Percentdirt, stain and grease-free without damaging them
ABOUT THE PRODUCT: Measurements - 13.5x9cm. Hand wash, air dry. Not suitable for coated pots and pans
description: Product Description Keep your kitchen, bathroom and other areas stain, grease and grime-free with this Scrub Mate Sponge, the miracle product from Elbow Grease. This magic sponge softens when used in warm water and stiffens in cold water. The product comes back to its hard form when completely dry. Perfect to clean pots, pans, oven, worktops, appliances, tiles, kitchen and bathroom sinks and showers. Pack of 1.
